main event: A bright object was sighted moving rapidly toward Toledo, Spain, on July 15, 1962, stopping briefly before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was reported by several observers,The sighting lasted for about 1.5 minutes,One observer saw a bluish-white light from a stationary object that lasted about 15 minutes, The object initially appeared to be a satellite, but its behavior was unusual, The object glowed intensely before vanishing.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
witness description: observers including a parent with children and other individuals in the area
